State.Author: Wesp5
State.Description: This is an unofficial patch for Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines by Troika Games. More details can be found on the following YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjAPznGjCtNZSBpF3CCrpJw) and the latest unofficial patch release candidates are available from ModDB.
State.Name: Vampire The Masquerade - Bloodlines Unofficial Patch

State.Author: Dev0lved

State.Name: NPCs Improved

State.Author: abvra
State.Description: This mod has optional RTGI RayTracing.  This is a serious attempt to make the lighting in this game truly realistic, while maintaining its vibrance and style.  This game has a lot of intense areas of both color and lighting, and deep shadows.  It was no easy task to balance these, and as a result the normal version is very FPS-intensive.  Have fun!
State.Name: Unrealistically Realistic - The Works- RayTracing - Reshade - ENB - HDR

State.Author: JadedWastrel
State.Description:
This mod brings Bloodlines Stamina soak more in line with the table top game. Stamina will now aid in Lethal Soak for Vampires much like it does in table top. Soak difficulty has been unchanged and the mod is designed to work with Wesp's Unofficial Bloodlines Patch.



Now also featuring a version for CQM while using Camarilla edition lite!
State.Name: Truly Soaking- A Lethal Soak Mod

State.Author: JadedWastrel
State.Description:
This mod brings Bloodlines Stamina soak more in line with the table top game. Stamina will now aid in Lethal Soak for Vampires much like it does in table top. Soak difficulty has been unchanged and the mod is designed to work with Wesp's Unofficial Bloodlines Patch.



Now also featuring a version for CQM while using Camarilla edition lite!
State.Name: Truly Soaking- A Lethal Soak Mod
